summary: A black metal band it is about to split up. In their way to one last gig at Hellfest festival an accidental death triggers numerous misadventures to four metalheads.
cast: Julien Doré|Grégory Gadebois|Jonathan Cohen|Yacine Belhousse|Audrey Fleurot|Alexandre Astier|Délia Espinat-Dief|Arsène Mosca|Christophe Kourotchkine|Vincent Leenhardt|Julien Renon|Evelyne Macko|Magali Miniac|James Rowe|Philippe Vieux|J.P. Nataf|Jean-Christophe Urbain|Pascal Vannson|Steeve Petit|Fiona Chauvin|Trond-Erik Vassal|Françoise Soucaret|Julien Francioli|Mark Eacersall|Muriel Darras|Mathieu Pigné|François Relo|Roland Berger|Frédéric Boismoreau|Yvon Prime
title: Pop Redemption
